definition: to live away from home
to send/to mail/to entrust/to depend on/to attach oneself to/to live (in a house)/to lodge/foster (son etc)
(archaic) sentence-final particle expressing a doubting attitude
surname Ju
to reside/to be (in a certain position)/to store up/to be at a standstill/residence/house/restaurant/classifier for bedrooms
hermit crab

sentences.english: Even strangers who were not Jews, could run to them for safety.
sentences.chinese: 連非猶太人的寄居者，也可以跑到逃城尋求庇護。

sentences.english: Woe to me that I dwell in Meshech, that I live among the tents of Kedar!
sentences.chinese: 我寄居在米設，住在基達帳棚之中，有禍了。

sentences.english: Earwig lives in your house too.
sentences.chinese: 地蜈蚣也可能寄居在你的房子裏。

sentences.english: And Abraham sojourned in the Philistines' land many days.
sentences.chinese: 亞伯拉罕在非利士人的地寄居了多日。

sentences.english: Other students constitution looking for the hermit crab and the fiddler crab observation in other places.
sentences.chinese: 其他的同學則在外面找寄居蟹和招潮蟹觀察。

sentences.english: The same law applies to the native-born and to the alien living among you.
sentences.chinese: 本地人和寄居在你們中間的外人同歸一例。

sentences.english: Bodi said goodbye to the little hermit crabs, swim forward again.
sentences.chinese: 波迪告別了小寄居蟹，又朝前游去。

sentences.english: And Abraham sojourned in the Philistines' land many days.
sentences.chinese: 在非利士人的地方寄居了許多日子。

sentences.english: Feed on mollusks, sea urchins, hermit crabs, and crabs at night (Ref. 9680).
sentences.chinese: 喫軟件動物，海膽，寄居蟹與螃蟹在晚上。

sentences.english: For we are strangers before you and sojourners, as all our fathers were.
sentences.chinese: 我們在你面前是客旅，是寄居的，與我們列祖一樣。

sentences.english: Ecoli is naturally found in the intestinal tracts of all warm-blooded animals, including humans.
sentences.chinese: 大腸桿菌是人及各種動物腸道中的正常寄居菌。

sentences.english: Woe is me, that I sojourn in Mesech, that I dwell in the tents of Kedar!
sentences.chinese: 我寄居在米設，住在基達帳棚之中，有禍了。

to settle down/to set up a home
